name: React Native Super App PRD
description: Cross-platform React Native application with modular feature packs, offline sync, and push engagement.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A React Native super app delivering multiple feature verticals (commerce, messaging, loyalty) with shared navigation and design system.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Modular feature packs, deep linking, offline data cache, push notifications, analytics instrumentation.

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: 60 FPS interactions, bundle size under 30MB, crash-free sessions > 99.3%, offline resilience with automatic conflict resolution.

sections.title: User Engagement
sections.content: Target DAU/MAU ratio of 35%, track retention cohorts, drive push open rate above 18%.

technology_profile.notes: Focus on adaptive navigation, OTA updates, and consistent module boundaries.

api_guidance.name: Firebase Cloud Messaging
api_guidance.rationale: Unified push notifications and topics for iOS + Android.

api_guidance.name: Segment Tracking API
api_guidance.rationale: Client analytics pipeline streaming to downstream tools.
